item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-02
item.description: Tesla is letting non-Tesla EVs use its Supercharger network for the first time (3 minute read) Ten Supercharger stations in the Netherlands are being made available to non-Tesla EVs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-05
item.description: Walmartâ€™s unannounced cloud gaming service detailed in confidential Epic emails (3 minute read) Project Storm is Walmart’s attempt at a cloud gaming service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-27
item.description: Elon Musk promises demo of a working Neuralink device on Friday (2 minute read) Neuralink will demonstrate a working device on August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-14
item.description: Apple just kicked Fortnite off the App Store (7 minute read) Fortnite has been removed from Apple’s App Store after Epic Games implemented its own in-app payment system that bypassed Apple’s standard 30 percent fee.
